item.title: Just Enough... git
item.description: This is just a list of git commands I am currently using. There are tons of tutorials out there as well as quite a few cheat sheets. While those are mostly comprehensive resources, I tend to get distracted and try to learn all commands at once without using them in real projects. That doesnâ€™t help much. Initialize a local git repository git init Cloning an existing project from github git clone <project url here> Status Check
